title: Scones
ingredients: 3 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for kneading
method: Step 2: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking sheet.
Step 3: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl; cut in butter with 2 knives or a pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Step 4: Whisk milk and egg in a small bowl; gradually stir into flour mixture until moistened.
Step 5: Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface and knead briefly, 5 or 6 turns.
Step 6: Pat or roll dough out into a 1/2-inch thick round. Cut into 8 wedge-shaped pieces and place onto the prepared baking sheet.
Step 7: Bake scones in the preheated oven until golden brown on top, about 15 minutes.
